**Zipper Pull**: If a zipper pull tab breaks off, a paperclip can serve as a makeshift replacement. By bending the paperclip into a small loop and attaching it to the zipper slider, you can easily pull up or down the zipper, making it functional again.

**Cable Organizer**: A paperclip can be transformed into a cable organizer by bending it into a shape that can hold multiple cables together. This can help declutter your workspace or keep your charging cables neatly arranged and tangle-free.

**Bookmark**: A paperclip can be used as a simple and effective bookmark. Just slide it onto the page you want to mark, and it will hold your place without damaging the paper. This is especially useful for thick books or notebooks.

**Picture Hanger**: A paperclip can be fashioned into a small hook to hang lightweight pictures or notes on a corkboard or wall. Simply bend the paperclip into a hook shape and secure it to the board to display your favorite photos or reminders.

**Reset Button Tool**: Many electronic devices, like routers or gaming consoles, have small reset buttons that require a pointed object to press. A straightened paperclip can be used to press these tiny buttons, allowing you to reset devices without needing a specialized tool.
